channel.title: How to crack brazzers/premium porn accounts. [TUT]
channel.description:
This tutorial posted on my blog is a tutorial on how to crack brazzers and other premium services using access diver.
[b]Basic Auth Cracking[/b]
[b]TOOLS NEEDED[/b]
-[url=http://www.brothersoft.com/d.php?soft_id=63984&url=http%3A%2F%2Ffiles.brothersoft.com%2Futilities%2Fnetwork%2Fad4.402.installer.exe]ACCESSDIVER[/url] -[url=http://www.lvllord.de/download.php?url=en/EvID4226Patch223d-en.zip]CONNECTIONS PATCH[/url]
For this tutorial I will be using [url=http://members.bangbros.com/]http://members.bangbros.com/[/url] as an example for all steps.
[b]WORDLISTS[/b]
You will need the ACCESSDIVER program
Step 1: Load GOOGLE in any version of [b]FIREFOX 2, NOT 3.[/b] It can be found [url=http://www.oldapps.com/firefox.php?old_firefox=7#Download]here.[/url]
Step 2: Take the link [url=http://members.bangbros.com/]http://members.bangbros.com/[/url] and insert *:*@ inbetween the second [b]/[/b] and the [b]m[/b] on members. http://*:*@members.bangbros.com/ is what it should look like.
Step 3: Copy the LINK you have just created and paste it into GOOGLE. Press the enter key.
Step 4: Right click in the white area of the search results screen then select VIEW PAGE INFO.
Step 5: Click the LINKS tab.
Step 6: Right click and press SELECT ALL then right click again and select COPY
Step 7: Create a NEW TEXT DOCUMENT and paste and save these links as RAWLINKS.
Step 8: Open ACCESSDIVER and go to MY SKILL and change it to EXPERT.
Step 9: Go the following tabs: DICTIONARY > WEB WORD LEECHER.
Step 10: Click the YELLOW FOLDER and load in RAWLINKS.TXT.
Step 11: Select START LEECHING at the bottom of the page.
Step 12: Press the FLOPPY DISC ICON and save it as WORDLIST.txt.
[b]PROXYLISTS[/b]
You will need the CONNECTIONS PATCH installed for this to work
Step 1: Find PROXY FOURMS that you can leech off of. You're on your own on this one.
Step 2: Once you get the lists save them into a text file named RAWPROXIES.
Step 3: Open ACCESSDIVER and click on the following tabs: PROXY > PROXY ANALYZER > ANALYZED PROXIES.
Step 4: Click the floppy disc and load in RAWPROXIES.TXT.
Step 5: At the bottom of the screen where it says "assume a proxy times out after _" type in 3.
Step 6: Click the ANALYZER SETTINGS tab then click ADD CODEEN/PROXYLAB PORTS IN LIST.
Step 7: Where it says USE THE SERVER URL ABOVE... click the drop down arrow and select the LAST one.
Step 8: Check to make sure the SPECIFY THE URL REFERRER... box is CHECKED.
Step 9: Add in the EXAMPLE URL ([url=http://members.bangbros.com/]http://members.bangbros.com/[/url])
Step 10: Go back to the ANALYZED PROXIES tab and click the SPEED/ACCURACY TESTER button.
Step 11: Delete unusable proxies by using the PAINTBRUSH at the bottom of the application.
Step 12: Click the FLOPPY DISC and save them as PROXYLIST.txt.
[b]BASIC AUTH CRACKING[/b]
You need the CONNECTIONS PATCH installed for this to work
Step 1: Load ACCESSDIVER
Step 2: Where it says SERVER load in the URL you wish to crack.
Step 3: Set the TEST SPEED to 10 BOTS
Step 4: Follow these tabs: PROXY > MY LIST
Step 5: Check the USE WEB PROXIES box if not already checked
Step 6: Load in PROXYLIST.TXT via YELLOW FOLDER.
Step 7: Follow these tabs: DICTIONARY > CURRENTLY USED
Step 8: Click the LOAD A COMBO FILE and select WORDLISTS.TXT.
Step 9: Click TEST BASIC AUTHENTICATION on the top left of the application
Step 10: You will find your results by following these tabs: HISTORY > WEAK LOGINS FOUND
Orginal post @ [url=http://3hit.net/mapu]3hit.net[/url]

item.description:
@mapu wrote:

This tutorial posted on my blog is a tutorial on how to crack brazzers and other premium services using access diver.

Basic Auth Cracking

TOOLS NEEDED

-ACCESSDIVER
-CONNECTIONS PATCH

For this tutorial I will be using http://members.bangbros.com/ as an example for all steps.

WORDLISTS

You will need the ACCESSDIVER program

Step 1: Load GOOGLE in any version of FIREFOX 2, NOT 3. It can be found here.

Step 2: Take the link http://members.bangbros.com/ and insert :@ inbetween the second / and the m on members. http://:@members.bangbros.com/ is what it should look like.

Step 3: Copy the LINK you have just created and paste it into GOOGLE. Press the enter key.

Step 4: Right click in the white area of the search results screen then select VIEW PAGE INFO.

Step 5: Click the LINKS tab.

Step 6: Right click and press SELECT ALL then right click again and select COPY

Step 7: Create a NEW TEXT DOCUMENT and paste and save these links as RAWLINKS.

Step 8: Open ACCESSDIVER and go to MY SKILL and change it to EXPERT.

Step 9: Go the following tabs: DICTIONARY > WEB WORD LEECHER.

Step 10: Click the YELLOW FOLDER and load in RAWLINKS.TXT.

Step 11: Select START LEECHING at the bottom of the page.

Step 12: Press the FLOPPY DISC ICON and save it as WORDLIST.txt.

PROXYLISTS

You will need the CONNECTIONS PATCH installed for this to work

Step 1: Find PROXY FOURMS that you can leech off of. You’re on your own on this one.

Step 2: Once you get the lists save them into a text file named RAWPROXIES.

Step 3: Open ACCESSDIVER and click on the following tabs: PROXY > PROXY ANALYZER > ANALYZED PROXIES.

Step 4: Click the floppy disc and load in RAWPROXIES.TXT.

Step 5: At the bottom of the screen where it says “assume a proxy times out after _” type in 3.

Step 6: Click the ANALYZER SETTINGS tab then click ADD CODEEN/PROXYLAB PORTS IN LIST.

Step 7: Where it says USE THE SERVER URL ABOVE… click the drop down arrow and select the LAST one.

Step 8: Check to make sure the SPECIFY THE URL REFERRER… box is CHECKED.

Step 9: Add in the EXAMPLE URL (http://members.bangbros.com/)

Step 10: Go back to the ANALYZED PROXIES tab and click the SPEED/ACCURACY TESTER button.

Step 11: Delete unusable proxies by using the PAINTBRUSH at the bottom of the application.

Step 12: Click the FLOPPY DISC and save them as PROXYLIST.txt.

BASIC AUTH CRACKING

You need the CONNECTIONS PATCH installed for this to work

Step 1: Load ACCESSDIVER

Step 2: Where it says SERVER load in the URL you wish to crack.

Step 3: Set the TEST SPEED to 10 BOTS

Step 4: Follow these tabs: PROXY > MY LIST

Step 5: Check the USE WEB PROXIES box if not already checked

Step 6: Load in PROXYLIST.TXT via YELLOW FOLDER.

Step 7: Follow these tabs: DICTIONARY > CURRENTLY USED

Step 8: Click the LOAD A COMBO FILE and select WORDLISTS.TXT.

Step 9: Click TEST BASIC AUTHENTICATION on the top left of the application

Step 10: You will find your results by following these tabs: HISTORY > WEAK LOGINS FOUND
